    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lightning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Foudre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relâmpago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lampo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστραπή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relámpago</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates how lightning occurs from the positive and negative charges produced when there is friction between water droplets and hailstones in a storm cloud.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clouds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hailstones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lightning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">storm cloud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water droplets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht, wie Blitz von den 
positiven und negativen produzierten Ladungen auftritt, wenn es 
Friktion zwischen Wassertröpfchen gibt und Hailstones in einem Sturm 
sich bewölken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre comment la foudre se produit 
des charges positives et négatives produites quand il y a de 
frottement entre les gouttelettes de l'eau et les grélons dans un 
donner l'assaut à opacifient.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra como o relâmpago ocorre das 
cargas positivas e negativas produzidas quando há uma fricção entre
gotas da água e os hailstones em uma tempestade cloud.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra come il lampo si presenta dalle
cariche positive e negative prodotte quando ci è attrito fra le 
goccioline dell'acqua ed i hailstones in una tempesta si apannano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί πώς η αστραπή εμφανίζεται από τις
θετικές και αρνητικές δαπάνες παραχθείσες όταν υπάρχει τριβή 
μεταξύ των σταγονίδιων ύδατος και των χαλαζόκοκκων σε ένα 
σύννεφο θύελλας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra cómo el relámpago ocurre de 
las cargas positivas y negativas producidas cuando hay fricción entre
las gotitas del agua y los granizos en una tormenta se nublan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wolken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
